content:
{"name": "Ray of Hope Mission Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "To become a client, you will need to call the store and schedule an appointment to meet with the intake counselor.

We service North East, Perryville, Port Deposit, Charlestown, Rising Sun, Colora, & Conowingo. 

Clothing is available upon approval.

", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "960 Craigtown Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Port Deposit", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21904", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.6303801, "longitude": -76.0766737}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 378-9800", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once Every 2 weeks"}]}
